Job Description:
Descripción de la empresa

SGS del Perú, compañía de origen suizo, referente mundial en servicios de inspección, verificación, análisis y certificación de productos y servicios con presencia en más de 150 países a nivel mundial. Se encuentra en la búsqueda de un Data Engineer & Developer para el área de Data & Innovation.

Descripción del empleo
Responsable del diseño e implementación de soluciones de información (Verificar disponibilidad de información, desarrollar los scripts, seguir flujos para la puesta en producción del desarrollo realizado, pruebas de calidad de todo el proceso, verificación de resultados).
Requisitos
Información adicional

Somos la consultora de tecnología que habilita la transformación digital de las organizaciones líderes de América Latina a través de soluciones basadas en la nube.

Requerimos para nuestro equipo de trabajo Data Engineer, para proyecto de 6 meses.

Requisitos
Carrera: Ingeniería de Sistemas, Ingeniería Informática o carrera afín.
Capacitación (De preferencia) : Cloud Computing, Analytics y Big Data, Transformación digital, AWS, GCP y/o Azure, etc.
Experiencia mínima de 3 años en Business Intelligence en gestión e implementación de proyectos.
Responsabilidades
Competencias

En TiSmart estamos enteramente comprometidos con el crecimiento de nuestros clientes internos y externos, nos apasionamos conceptualizando y desarrollando soluciones innovadoras que agreguen valor sus actividades y procesos.

Contamos con un equipo multidisciplinario que nos permite Co-crear y construir soluciones tecnológicas con una perspectiva cada vez más amplia.

Te invitamos a sumar a nuestro equipo como: Data Engineer

REQUISITOS:
Conocimientos solidos de manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos en GCP, Cloud Storage, Data Flow, BigQuery, Apacha Beam
Al menos 2 años de experiencia en ingesta de datos, capacidad para diseñar, construir y administrar estructuras de datos que abarcan la transformación de datos, modelos de datos, esquemas, metadatos y gestión de la carga de trabajo.
BENEFICIOS:
Te invitamos a visitar nuestra página: http://www.tismart.com/

“Tismart mantiene una política de contratación inclusiva, por lo que invita a cualquier persona a participar en el proceso de selección en referencia”

-- Title One -- Technical skills -- End Title One --


-- Description One --Languages: Python
Cloud: AWS or Azure, GCP-- End Description One --

-- About You --You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.



3+ years of experience with Python
3+ years of data delivery, ETL (extract, transform and load) and data warehouse design, analysis, and programming experience.
Experience with an excellent grasp of relational and dimensional data modeling
Strong mathematical and analytics skills
3+ years of Agile experience
Experience with ML (Desirable)
English is a requirement, as you will be working directly with US-based clients.

Azumo is looking for a highly motivated Backend Engineer to develop and enhance high performing and scalable backend infrastructures in AI, NLP and conversational software environments.

We will only be considering candidates based in Latin America, as most of our engineers are based there.

This position will give you the opportunity to collaborate with a growing team and bright engineering minds in AI computing. You will enjoy the role if you love designing and developing scalable, high performant backend infrastructure using Golang, Java, Python, NodeJS open-source frameworks and connecting applications to modern cloud-based technologies.

Responsibilities:
Basic Qualifications:
Preferred Qualifications:
The Backend Engineer will be based remotely. Compensation commensurate with experience and candidate potential.

At Azumo we strive for excellence and strongly believe in professional and personal growth. We want each individual to be successful and pledge to help each achieve their goals while at Azumo and beyond. Challenging ourselves and learning new technologies is at the core of what we do.

Based in San Francisco, California, Azumo is an innovative software development firm helping organizations build intelligent apps using the latest technologies in AI, data and cloud. We are passionate about solving key problems for customers around the globe.

If you are qualified for the opportunity and looking for a challenge please apply online at https://azumo.workable.com or connect with us at people@azumo.co

-- Main Description --We are looking for an experienced QA Automation Engineer with a keen eye for detail to design testing procedures for our customer’s software applications. Ready for the challenge? -- End Main Description --

-- Title One -- Technical skills -- End Title One --
- Description One --Knowledge of automation and agile methodology.
ISTQB certification (CFTL is a plus).
Knowledge of automation and agile methodologies (SCRUM).-- End Description One --

-- About You --You are someone who wants to influence your own development. You’re looking for a company where you have the opportunity to pursue your interests and be able to grow professionally.



Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or related field.
2 years (minimum) as a QA analyst.
English is a requirement, as you will be working directly with US-based clients.
Proven experience developing automated test systems using Selenium and/or Appium (for mobile testing).
Analytical and Problem-Solving thinking skills.
Experience with Java, Javascript or Python development.
Experience with tools for web-based applications such as Selenium WebDriver, TestNG , Cypress, Protractor or WebDriver IO.
Knowledge in mobile testing (Appium).
Experience with any API test automation tool: Postman, REST Assured.
Working knowledge in agile testing.

Introduction
At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Gestión de sistemas Oracle Application & Database, DB2 LUW, MySQL
Monitoreo de la plataforma Oracle Application & Database, DB2, SQL
Atención de requerimientos en plataforma Oracle Application & Database, DB2, SQL
Informar avances al responsable del equipo.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise


About Business Unit
At Global Technology Services (GTS), we help our clients envision the future by offering end-to-end IT and technology support services, supported by an unmatched global delivery network. It's a unique blend of bold new ideas and client-first thinking. If you can restlessly reinvent yourself and solve problems in new ways, work on both technology and business projects, and ask, "What else is possible?" GTS is the place for you!

Your Life @ IBM
What matters to you when youre looking for your next career challenge?

Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible.

Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever.

About IBM
IBMs greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries.

Location Statement
For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Are you an experienced software engineer with deep experience in building and shipping amazing products? Do you have high standards when it comes to code quality and user experiences? Are you the best developer on your team? Are you ready to work alongside the best engineers in the world for name-brand, industry leading companies? Do you want to work in a positive, uplifting work environment, for a company with a 4.5 star rating on GlassDoor? Is a competitive compensation and benefits package important to you?

Join FullStack Labs as we revolutionize the software consulting industry, and execute on our mission to rid the world of ugly, outdated, buggy software.

As an engineer at FullStack Labs you will help our incredible clients achieve their technical goals in one of two ways: 1) Team Augmentation: You will integrate yourself directly into our client’s team and work alongside their existing engineers on a daily basis. 2) Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs development team to build and ship greenfield applications for our clients.

ABOUT US

VTEX is the only multitenant commerce platform capable of unifying experiences in all sales channels. With a robust solution, scalable cloud infrastructure and powerful tooling, our platform accelerates the transformation of complex operations.

More than 3400 renowned companies of varying sizes and segments, with operations in 43 countries and in global expansion, have in VTEX the solution for the online sale of their products, among them major names such as Sony, Motorola, Walmart, Whirlpool, Coca-Cola, Stanley Black & Decker, and Nestlé.

OUR CULTURE

TRUST TO BE TRUSTED: We trust each other without reservations and delegate our responsibilties continuously. To be trustworthy you need honesty, transparency and consistency in quality and performance. This bond is built upon exchange: trust to be trusted.

Wolfram Research, creator of Mathematica, Wolfram|Alpha and the Wolfram Language, has an opportunity for an experienced software engineer to adapt and extend Wolfram data frameworks as part of a small close-knit team. Typical tasks include improving and enhancing frameworks for constructing and populating the databases that hold Wolfram|Alpha's data and optimizing queries, including adding new query paths. Languages and tools used include MySQL, Java and the Wolfram Language. Applicants must be prepared to provide data modeling advice to content developers and be able to reason clearly about unfamiliar domains.

Location: Lima, Peru

Wolfram is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at its company. Women, people of color, members of the LGBTQ community, individuals with disabilities and veterans are strongly encouraged to apply.

About RappiBank
At RappiBank, we will reshape the financial ecosystem by building the largest digital bank in Latin America. To accomplish this mission, we are assembling a world-class team to build and deliver high quality financial products to the market.
Data is our biggest asset and we are building a truly data driven company around it. We are hiring the most talented engineers and data scientists in Latin América to build world-class products from the ground up that will be used by millions.

About the role
As an effective BIE, you are an enabler. You will not work on ad-hoc data requests. You will develop solutions that enable people to self-serve. These solutions might be automated dashboards to visualize KPIs, scheduled ETLs, query templates, script packages, or training sessions. Your responsibility will be to empower other teams to get data & insights by engineering the solutions and processes required to enable them.

SGS del Perú, compañía de origen suizo, referente mundial en servicios de inspección, verificación, análisis y certificación de productos y servicios con presencia en más de 150 países a nivel mundial. Se encuentra en la búsqueda de un Data Analystpara el área de Data & Innovation

Descripción del empleo
Liderar proyectos de business analytics con metodología agile.
Elaborar dashboards para la unidad de negocio de AFL (Agriculture, food and life sciences services).
Realizar análisis cuantitativos y predictivos.
Requisitos
Información adicional

Company Description

Bertoni Solutions is looking for a Second-level Support Engineer. We are a multinational team of individuals who believe that with the right knowledge and approach, technology is the answer to the challenges that business face today. We have been bringing this knowledge and approach to our customers since 2016, helping them translate technology into their success.

With Swiss roots and our own development team in Lima and throughout the region, we offer the best of both cultural areas: the talent and passion of Latin American professionals combined with Swiss organization skills and mindset.

Job Description

A second-level support engineer is tasked with receiving categorized support requests and resolving them efficiently and prioritized. You will be working with an ERP system running in the Azure Cloud on 6 continents. With extensive knowledge in database queries, you will be in charge of correcting erroneously recorded data, taking the necessary measures to safeguard the integrity of the data, backing up and restoring the information if necessary. You will be also in charge of working with incidents that handle information in JSON and XML format and working them in conjunction with the databases.

Qualifications

Additional Information

About Finsmart Perú:

Finsmart is an online platform that offers account receivables from SMEs with cash needs to those who want to invest in them. Our mission is to give access to financial and investment products for people and companies through technology. Our team is based in Peru, but now we're also recruiting talent from other countries.

What will you do at Finsmart?
Responsible for the testing of web applications, combined with back-end integration testing. Projects include FinTech and online banking solutions.
Prepare test plans and create, maintain, and execute test cases.
Write e2e tests to automate the QA process from the end-user perspective.
